column4: hey for compiling new kernel all i need are the kernel-image and kernel-headers files from the repos right?
need it to fix some issues
like the double clock on amd64
and dma on my hard drive
ahh ok and that should also download everything else i need?
hopefully the new kernel will fix my dma and clock, and maybe acpi
by downloading kernel-tree does synaptic also download kernel-package?
ok so download kernel-tree and kernel-package, anything else?
will you be apt-getting these things?
